snippet.title: Game & Watch - Mario The Juggler (c)1991 Nintendo [MAME emulation footage]
snippet.description:
This is another Game & Watch unit that has been emulated for a few months now, but where I hadn't got around to putting a video up here.  Mario The Juggler is the final game and watch, released as late as 1991.  It pays homage to the very first Game and Watch 'Ball' by having very similar gameplay, but also gives a nod to the future direction of Nintendo in the artistic styling of Mario and the relatively colourful backgrounds.  A fitting way to end the series.  As usual emulation was by Algestam and co.

Game & Watch artwork for MAME was done by DarthMarino (more recently emulated units) and hydef (units emulated before 2020)
https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1vl9O-0jIGCHHY_lrWpOwBtqTXEKsVGOY  DarthMarino 
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1WLKcvynl0ky2mRL1UacA9yaiMTnNs4x5 hydef
